si.title: யாழில் கொக்கெயினுடன் ஒருவர் கைது
body_lines: යාපනයේ පොලිස් අපරාධ ඒකකයට ලැබුණු රහස්ය තොරතුරු මත යාපනය පොලිසිය විසින් බ්රහස්පතින්දා (18) අත්අඩංගුවට ගෙන තිබේ

en.title: One arrested with Kokain in Jaffna
body_lines: Jaffna police have been arrested by Jaffna Police on Thursday (18) based on confidential information received by the Jaffna Police Crime Unit
